name: LD43 Sacrificant Rising
description:
You were doomed to be sacrificed in a dark ritual...

Until you sucker punched Death and stole his scythe!

The demons aren't pleased with this turn of events and have come to stop you.

Victim no longer, you are now the Sacrificant! And you're looking for some payback!

Controls:

Move: WASD keys
Aim: Mouse
Swing Scythe: Left-Click
Soulflame Dash: Right-Click

Credits:

Art, Programming, Design:
    Brent Chance

Music:
    Eric Halin (Band Camp Album)
